text:
<!here|@here>: welcome back!  I see Peter’s already got a Jira strom going (good!) however, hold off on executing on any tasks as Im creating two new epics:
- 1.02 Release (This WEDNESDAY, goal)
- 1.1 Release: ~ Release in 2 weeks

I’ll update the thread here once the 1.02 Epic and tasks are loaded up
if <@U0EL0GLEL> and <@U02E3CRMA> could get started by building rig and downloading the VM from james, that’d be great
/giphy office space movie bill lumberg
/giphy lumberg yeah
I’ll download the VM image and get it updated.
thanks.  see james’ note about marker cubbies <@U02E3CRMA> ?
already responded
<@U0EL0GLEL>: is this still worth keeping open?
<https://uncorkedstudios.atlassian.net/browse/BWB-259>
Don't think it's a concern. The techs know how to get things running there
word
Ok <!here|@here> the bare bones of our next sprint, here: <https://uncorkedstudios.atlassian.net/browse/BWB-387>
more will be added but <@U0EL0GLEL> can ya take a look at the tix and let me know of questions?  also curious if you feel thi sis an achieable ammount of work for mon, tues, wed of next week
yep that sounds fine
cool, lets actually discuss in a bit.  i’m culling the larger list this morning
<@U02E3CRMA>: how much time left on download?
no idea - got a network error and had to restart :angry:

i checked my running list i had in the last day there, and i have an note about the videos might be clearing when you edit a workshop. not sure if that was what was happening or if i just had too many tabs open or chupacabras got in there. But lets take a look at this, Possible loss of saved videos on edit of a workshop. It might be erasing them on load, or not loading them into memory on load and then they are gone with saved again. Or it was just that issue with the key being not authorized for them. not sure but worth looking at. would be a fast one
when are we thinking we want to meet and go over this?
somehow missed this.  i have a note out to joel but if i dont hear back in 15 min, peter then you and i will just discuss the epic list
<@U0EL0GLEL>: in mean time, can you type up instructions for how james can update APi key (and the key he should use)?  just email to me
I talked to him on site, he knows what to do, I am not sure if he has the key, but he knows how to do the update
ok
can i have the key then and i’ll follow up with him/
AIzaSyCxjnIZmA1u7RXQfKHu63PN4pagdVLypus
is that real or you f’ing with me?
thats real
am I having a stroke?
<@U0EL0GLEL>: forgot to mention on my way out, VM is downloaded and ready
awesome
<@U02E3CRMA>: lets catch up when youre back, pls
<@U0EL0GLEL>: update jira ticket letting us know youre ready to DEV on Monday, today before ya leave
yep
